content.rendered:
At Dr. Shafaei Clinics we are dedicated to providing our clients with a very personal level of care in an environment where they can feel safe and relaxed at all times.

Our aim is to provide an individualised service, giving our clients personalised anti-aging and skin health treatment strategies that can take them from their 20’s and 30’s right the way through to their 60’s and beyond.

Most importantly, unlike so many clinics today we pride ourselves as being a doctors only clinic. Which means that all our Cosmetic treatments are performed by a highly skilled and award winning cosmetics physician, with over 15 years’ experience in the cosmetics field and excellent communication and interpersonal skills which are essential to understanding each patient’s individual needs. Attention to detail and the meticulous execution of all procedures ensures that patients receive the highest level of care, allowing you to look and feel your best.

Our Philosophy

At Dr. Shafaei Clinics we strive to help you look and feel great. Our aim is to capture and create the best of your natural beauty at each and every stage in your life’s journey.

We view Cosmetic treatments as a tool for enhancing your greatest assets, allowing your natural inner beauty to shine and your confidence to soar as you gracefully age with style and charisma.
